snippet.title: Kaapelipeli: The Cable Game - Steam Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Kaapelipeli: The Cable Game will receive its long waited Steam release on July 10th! Witness the unique gameplay combined with cozy pixel graphics. Travel through various landscapes and meet all kinds of people from pesky landowners to ghost postboxes! 

Wishlist and follow us on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1335350/Kaapelipeli_The_Cable_Game/

Download DEMO: https://eikaitsiinastudios.itch.io/the-cable-game-demo

Play mobile and other versions on Google Play/Gamesalad Arcade/Gamejolt/Itch.io 

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.kaapelipelidemo.game&hl=fi

http://arcade.gamesalad.com/games/153170

https://gamejolt.com/games/TheCableGameDemo/467726

Find Lore and Tips here:
https://kaapelipeli.fandom.com/wiki/Kaapelipeli_Wiki 

Kaapelipeli: The Cable Game is a true one-of-the-kind shooter-action-casual-rpg-adventure-survival -game. (Game concept is based on real life! (Remotely!))

Players job is to guide a lonely project engineer to the transformer while avoiding angry landowners and endangered animals. Player can shoot contracts against stubborn landowners and use drills to destroy rocks and other obstacles. It is encouraged to place marking sticks and pick up boosts along the way to get points and to increase players stats. Later player will also dig through the marked route!

With Kaapelipeli: The Cable Game, you can experience over 30 levels with different terrains and inhabitants and meet beautiful yet dangerous flora & fauna. You may explore offices, towns, rural areas, forests, arctic areas and perhaps make some friends along the way =)

https://kaapelipeli.fandom.com/wiki/Kaapelipeli_Wiki

Other Game assets and graphic art: 
https://kaapelipeli.fandom.com/wiki/Credits
